meanings.sent2: She generally wakes up early for work.
meanings.sent3: The cat generally ignores me until I have food.
meanings.sent4: His jokes generally fall flat with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The teacher generally gives pop quizzes to keep students on their toes.

meanings.definition: In a general manner; without specific details.
meanings.sent1: He generally talks about his day without going into specifics.
meanings.sent2: The instructions were generally clear, but some details were missing.
meanings.sent3: I generally follow the recipe, but sometimes I add my own twist.
meanings.sent4: Her paintings generally capture the essence of nature without intricate details.
meanings.sent5: The report generally summarizes the main points without delving into specifics.

meanings.definition: In a broad or overall way.
meanings.sent1: The discussion generally focused on the economy as a whole.
meanings.sent2: She generally views life from a broad perspective.
meanings.sent3: The movie generally portrays a positive message about friendship.
meanings.sent4: His speech generally touched on key issues affecting society at large.
meanings.sent5: The book generally explores themes of love and loss in a wide context.
